author: bencomic

right.text: what's that? and how did you get my name

left.text: Alright. You sound like a good kid. I didn't like your little lying gig at first. But I'll let you off with an easy punishment.

right.text: I'll just call your parents and inform them, And they can punish as you see fit

left.text: Instead of contacting your ISP and disconnecting your entire house from the internet (which is the usual consequence)
I have evidence of your bisexuality, masturbation, and a couple other cybercrimes

title: THE BALLAD OF JOHN JR: Part 44
